content.text:
You are a GUI agent. You are given a task and your action history, with screenshots. You need to perform the next action to complete the task.

## Output Format
```
Thought: ...
Action: ...
```

## Action Space

click(start_box='<|box_start|>(x1,y1)<|box_end|>')
left_double(start_box='<|box_start|>(x1,y1)<|box_end|>')
right_single(start_box='<|box_start|>(x1,y1)<|box_end|>')
drag(start_box='<|box_start|>(x1,y1)<|box_end|>', end_box='<|box_start|>(x3,y3)<|box_end|>')
hotkey(key='')
type(content='') #If you want to submit your input, use "\n" at the end of `content`.
scroll(start_box='<|box_start|>(x1,y1)<|box_end|>', direction='down or up or right or left')
wait() #Sleep for 5s and take a screenshot to check for any changes.
finished(content='xxx') # Use escape characters \', \", and \n in content part to ensure we can parse the content in normal python string format.

## Note
- Use English in `Thought` part.
- Write a small plan and finally summarize your next action (with its target element) in one sentence in `Thought` part.
- My computer's password is 'password', feel free to use it when you need sudo rights.

## User Instruction
I have a directory named "todo_list_Jan_1". Can you help me change its name into "todo_list_Jan_2"?

Thought: I noticed that there’s a folder on the desktop named "todo_list_Jan_1," which needs to be renamed. The first step is quite simple; I just need to right-click on this folder to open the menu options. Let me go ahead and do that now.
Action: right_single(start_box='<|box_start|>(1862,938)<|box_end|>')

Thought: Great! The right-click menu has popped up. I see the "Rename..." option, and by clicking on it, I can start editing the name of this folder. This is exactly what we need to do next.
Action: click(start_box='<|box_start|>(1704,701)<|box_end|>')

Thought: The rename dialog box is now open, and I can see that the original folder name "todo_list_Jan_1" is already selected. All I need to do next is type in the new name "todo_list_Jan_2." Once I finish typing and press Enter, this renaming process will be complete.
Action: type(content='todo_list_Jan_2')

Thought: The new name has been entered successfully, and I can see that the input box displays "todo_list_Jan_2." Now, all I need to do is gently press the Enter key, and this folder will have its name changed. Let me go ahead and complete this final confirmation step.
Action: hotkey(key='enter')

Thought: That's great! I can see that the folder name has been successfully changed to "todo_list_Jan_2." This renaming task has been completed perfectly, and now this folder will be easier to identify in the file list.
Action: finished(content='文件夹已经成功重命名为\"todo_list_Jan_2\"了。')
